name: Sutoringu
description:
Sutoringu! is a typical, yet beautiful typing game.  Stylized with falling sakura petals it takes your mind into Japanese world.  Tranquil and light for memorizing kana and kanji. Try typing in the romaji for falling down characters and earn points for quick and correct answers. Though, it is best enjoyed after some prior learning.


You can start with hiragana or katakana. Test your knowledge of diacritics - dakuten and handakuten signs! Check out kanji. Play with them grade by grade. Lastly - compare your results with other players and review missed characters.

Try it and you discover new kanji meanings, together with their on'yomi and kun'yomi readings. You will soon find that it can be pretty fun - an enjoyable break from the boring memorizing!
